import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const { loading, error, users } = userList console.log(JSON.stringify(users)) useEffect(() => { dispatch(listUsers()) }, [dispatch]) return (

UserList

{loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( {users.map(user => ( {/* */} ))}
ID Name Email address Admin
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ) : }${user.totalPrice}
)}
) } export default UserListScreen
